Descriptions.first_week: Track your prayers consistently for a full week.
Descriptions.first_month: Maintain prayer tracking for an entire month.

Premium.Title: Join Prayer Tracker Plus
Premium.Subtitle: Elevate Your Spiritual Journey
Premium.WelcomeMessage: Your support helps us spread khair (goodness) and assist the Ummah in strengthening their connection with Allah (SWT).

Friends.title: Prayer Circle & Friends
Friends.description: Connect with friends, share prayer achievements, and motivate each other in your spiritual journey. Build a supportive community that helps everyone stay consistent in their prayers.

Awards.title: Special Prayer Awards
Awards.description: Unlock exclusive awards and achievements that recognize your dedication to prayer. Track your progress and celebrate your spiritual milestones.

Widgets.title: Custom Prayer Widgets
Widgets.description: Beautiful, customizable widgets for your home screen to keep track of prayer times and your daily spiritual goals.

Analytics.title: Detailed Prayer Analytics
Analytics.description: Get insights into your prayer habits with detailed statistics, trends, and personalized recommendations to improve your consistency.

Reminders.title: Smart Prayer Reminders
Reminders.description: Personalized, location-aware prayer notifications that adapt to your schedule and help you never miss a prayer.

Themes.title: Beautiful Themes
Themes.description: Choose from a variety of beautiful, carefully crafted themes to personalize your prayer tracking experience.

Support.title: Priority Support
Support.description: Get priority access to our support team and be the first to try new features as they're released.

Premium.AutoRenew: Subscription will automatically renew. Cancel anytime.
Premium.ErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Premium.RestoreSuccess: Your premium features have been restored!
Premium.Future: And more features coming soon, In sha Allah
Premium.TeamMessage: Alhamdulillah, this project is built and maintained with dedication and love. We strive to help you maintain your prayers and grow spiritually, seeking Allah's pleasure in every feature we create.
Premium.BismillahMessage: Bismillah, let's begin this blessed journey together

Freemium.Title: Prayer Tracker +
Freemium.Description: Join our Premium plan and unlock exclusive features, including the ability to track your prayer progress and share it with your friends.
Freemium.UpgradePrompt: Please, upgrade to a premium plan

Account.Title: Account
Account.DeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Account.DeleteMessage: This action is irreversible, and we will be sad to see you go. All your data will be permanently deleted.

Agreement.Title: Agreement to Terms
Agreement.Content: By accessing and using the Pray Tracker app, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the app.

Usage.Title: Acceptable Use
Usage.Content: You agree to use Pray Tracker only for its intended purpose of tracking and managing your daily prayers. You must not use the app in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the app or impairment of the availability or accessibility of Pray Tracker.

UserContent.Title: User Content
UserContent.Content: Any content you submit to Pray Tracker, including prayer records and personal information, remains your property. However, by submitting content, you grant us a license to use, modify, and display that content for the purpose of providing our services.

Subscription.Title: Premium Subscription
Subscription.Content: Some features of Pray Tracker are available through a premium subscription. Subscription fees are non-refundable except where required by law. We reserve the right to modify subscription pricing with reasonable notice.

Termination.Title: Account Termination
Termination.Content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for any breach of these Terms and Conditions. Upon termination, your right to use Pray Tracker will immediately cease.

Changes.Title: Changes to Terms
Changes.Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes. Your continued use of Pray Tracker following changes to these terms constitutes acceptance of those changes.

Contact.Title: Contact Us
Contact.Content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at support@praytracker.com

DataCollection.Title: Information We Collect
DataCollection.Content: We collect information you provide directly, including your name, email address, and prayer records. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you use Pray Tracker to improve your experience.

DataUse.Title: How We Use Your Information
DataUse.Content: We use your information to provide and improve Pray Tracker services, communicate with you, and personalize your experience. Your prayer data is used to generate insights and statistics about your prayer habits to help you maintain consistency in your spiritual journey.

DataSharing.Title: Information Sharing
DataSharing.Content: We do not sell or share your personal information. Your data is strictly used within the Pray Tracker app to provide you with the best prayer tracking experience. Your privacy is our top priority.

Security.Title: Data Security
Security.Content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. We continuously work to protect your data using industry-standard security practices.

Changes.Title: Changes to Privacy Policy
Changes.Content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date.

Contact.Title: Contact Us
Contact.Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@praytracker.com
